name: Griddlers TED and PET 2
description:
Are these long grey days getting you down? Or maybe you love dinosaurs and are itching for a taste of their world?! Now the time has finally come to head into the past with your fellow courageous time travellers! This time professor Ted and his smart robot T.E.D. are in the prehistoric period.
In this journey, you'll find yourself solving a multitude of fantastic puzzles, and you won't want to stop once you grapple with them! Advance through levels of varying difficulty and encounter more and more difficult griddlers.
Pass the time with this game and enjoy the excellent graphics and fantastic music!
In this new adventure you'll solve tons of fun brain teasers that once you start, you won't ever want to stop!
Are you ready to accept this challenge and complete hundreds of tough levels? Explore a whole new world and make it home to the future by solving all the puzzles! Don't waste any time, start right now!

- Relax and train your brain at the same time with Japanese crosswords!
- 120 Jurassic-park themed Japanese crosswords!
- Over 10 hours of gameplay with themed music!
- Easy and understandable tutorial!
- Special quests and over 15 colorful trophies!
- Bright and colorful theme!
- Sick of ads? Make any purchase to cancel them!
